description: Discriminants of real quadratic number fields.
references: David A. Cox, "Primes of the Form x^2 + n y^2", Wiley, 1989, p. 103.
formula: For squarefree n >= 2, a(n)=n if n=1 mod 4 else 4n.
maple: with(numtheory): a:= proc(n) if issqrfree(n) then RETURN(piecewise(n mod 4=1,n,4*n)) else RETURN(NULL) fi: end: seq(a(n),n=2..150); (C. Ronaldo)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from C. Ronaldo (aga_new_ac(AT)hotmail.com), Jan 03 2005
